# Aplikasi Listrik - Sistem Manajemen Listrik

## Project Overview
- **Frontend**: React 18 + Vite + TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Express.js + MySQL
- **Auth**: JWT + bcryptjs

## Tech Stack
- Node.js v18+
- MySQL v8+
- React Router v6
- Axios
- Lucide React Icons
- React Hot Toast

## Quick Start
```bash
# Backend
cd backend && npm install && npm run db:setup && npm run dev

# Frontend (terminal baru)
cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
```

## Default Login
- Admin: admin@listrik.com / admin123

## Database Tables
1. users - Authentication
2. customers - Data pelanggan
3. tariffs - Tarif listrik
4. meter_readings - Pencatatan meter
5. bills - Tagihan
6. payments - Pembayaran

## API Base URL
- Backend: http://localhost:5000/api
- Frontend: http://localhost:5173

Lihat DOCUMENTATION.md untuk detail lengkap.
6. Login with admin@listrik.com / admin123

See SETUP.md for detailed instructions.
